mapper.sql: id, name, code, menu_id, enabled, description, url, priority, create_time, create_man_id, update_man_id, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT o.id as id, o.name as name, o.code as code, o.menu_id as menuId, o.enabled as enabled, o.description as description, o.url as url, o.priority as priority, o.create_time as createTime, m.name as menuName FROM sys_power o LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON m.id = o.menu_id

SELECT DISTINCT sys_power.`code` as code FROM r_role_power r_role_power LEFT JOIN sys_power sys_power ON sys_power.id = r_role_power.power_id WHERE r_role_power.role_id IN ( SELECT r_role_user.role_id FROM r_role_user r_role_user, sys_user sys_user WHERE r_role_user.user_id = sys_user.id AND sys_user.enabled = 1 AND sys_user.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_power
id,
name,
code,
menu_id,
enabled,
description,
url,
priority,
create_time,
create_man_id,
update_man_id,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_power
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man_id = #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_man_id = #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_power set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man_id = #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_man_id = #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
